Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL OPERATIONS
REFERENCE CHANGED TO WAYS AND MEANS
ORDERED TO THIRD READING RULES CAL.822

Title: Permits Yates county assistant district attorneys and assistant public defenders to reside in Chemung county
Summary: Permits Yates county assistant district attorneys and assistant public defenders to reside in Chemung county.
LawCode: Amd ยง3, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal subdivisions 38 and 38-a of section 3 of the public officers law, relating to exempting Yates county assistant district attorneys and assistant public defenders from the requirement to reside in Yates county
